>
[Auspicious Scepter](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1039)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 179 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=7)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This imperious _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=7)_ has a glowing orb in the shape of an eye set in its flanged head. When you succeed at a check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about a creature after you've dealt it damage with the _auspicious scepter_, you learn one of its resistances in addition to any other information.
